## Port.provide() method

The host-side equivalent of [register()](./uix-guest.register.md)<!-- -->. Pass a set of methods down to the guest as proxies.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
provide(apis: RemoteHostApis): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  apis | RemoteHostApis |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
